channel.title: Flawless Powerminer for SCAR 3.13
channel.description:
I'm looking for a flawless Powerminer for SCAR 3.13 as the title says. Almost all of the powerminers I've tried have gotten at least one error in them.
I would REALLY like to use Sumilion's powerminer because I used it a while back but I can't remember what version of SCAR I used. If anyone can hook me up with a good script and the right version of SCAR to run it with, I'd be very thankful. :D Thanks all.
Or even if someone could direct me to a good powerminer thread that someone has already posted I'd appreciate it.

item.title: Flawless Powerminer for SCAR 3.13
item.dc:creator: @jdsd jdsd
item.description:
@jdsd wrote:

Where do you learn to write scar scripts? I am interested in learning but, everyone in my town are complete imbeciles in anything computerized besides sports video games.

Read full topic

item.title: Flawless Powerminer for SCAR 3.13
item.dc:creator: @necrohag necrohag
item.description:
@necrohag wrote:

You should learn how to write SCAR scripts, i am learning myself now, it will come in handy.

Read full topic
